title: Scaffold Artifact v0.1
description: Schema for .ai/task-artifacts/<TASK-ID>/scaffold.yaml generated by the scaffold pass.

task_id.description: Task ID, e.g., "TASK-001". Must match the task ID in the prompt header.

author.description: Name of the operator who initiated the task

created_at.description: Timestamp when the scaffold artifact was created

spec_reference.description: Reference to the spec artifact used for this scaffolding pass

file.description: Path to the file relative to the project root directory

commit_sha.description: SHA of the commit that applied the change

commit_message.description: Commit message of the change (multi-line string)

notes.description: Additional notes about the applied diff

unresolved_questions.description: List of questions that were not answered during the scaffold pass

items.description: Question that was not answered during the scaffold pass
